keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for mental health to be on the agenda, ensuring treatment is available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, and improving NHS mental health services.

issues.health: Emphasizes the importance of improving the NHS and mental health services, expressing concern over the treatment of patients and the waiting time for services.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a child, Dr Mohsin Khan spent a lot of time in and out of hospital which inspired him to become a doctor. He expresses a desire to help sick people and improve the way the NHS treats patients. Concerned about the state of mental health services, the imbalance in the treatment of patients, and the long waiting times for mental health assessments.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Dr Mohsin Khan notes that approximately 1 in 4 people will face a mental health issue in the UK, and believes the Liberal Democrats have the best plan for ensuring patients get the best care possible.
